name: rankid

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)))), wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))))

cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈(R1 ` suc((rank ` c0)))
⊣ (c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)→ c0 ∈(R1 ` suc((rank ` c0))))
⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)))))
